verses.verse: Send <S%H7971><s%> ye the lambs <S%H3733><s%> for the ruler <S%H4910><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> from Selah <S%H5554><s%> to the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, unto the mount <S%H2022><s%> of the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>.

For it shall be that <S%H5074><s%>, as wandering birds <S%H5775><s%>, as a scattered <S%H7971><s%> nest <S%H7064><s%>, so shall the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> be at the fords <S%H4569><s%> of the Arnon <S%H769><s%>.

Give counsel <S%H6098><s%>, execute <S%H6213><s%> justice <S%H6415><s%>; make <S%H7896><s%> thy shade <S%H6738><s%> as the night <S%H3915><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the noonday <S%H6672><s%>; hide <S%H5641><s%> the outcasts <S%H5080><s%>; betray not the fugitive <S%H5074><s%>.

Let mine outcasts <S%H5080><s%> dwell <S%H1481><s%> with thee <S%H4124><s%>; as for Moab, be <S%H1933><s%> thou a covert <S%H5643><s%> to him from the face <S%H6440><s%> of the destroyer <S%H7703><s%>. For the extortioner <S%H4160><s%> is brought to nought <S%H656><s%>, destruction <S%H7701><s%> ceaseth <S%H3615><s%>, the oppressors <S%H7429><s%> are consumed <S%H8552><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>.

And a throne <S%H3678><s%> shall be established <S%H3559><s%> in lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%>; and one shall sit <S%H3427><s%> thereon in truth <S%H571><s%>, in the tent <S%H168><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, judging <S%H8199><s%>, and seeking <S%H1875><s%> justice <S%H4941><s%>, and swift <S%H4106><s%> to do righteousness <S%H6664><s%>.

We have heard <S%H8085><s%> of the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%>, that he is very <S%H3966><s%> proud <S%H1341><s%>; even of his arrogancy <S%H1346><s%>, and his pride <S%H1347><s%>, and his wrath <S%H5678><s%>; his boastings are nought <S%H907><s%>.

Therefore shall Moab <S%H4124><s%> wail <S%H3213><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%>, every one shall wail <S%H3213><s%>: for the raisin-cakes <S%H808><s%> of Kir-hareseth <S%H7025><s%> shall ye mourn <S%H1897><s%>, utterly stricken <S%H5218><s%>.

For the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> languish <S%H535><s%>, and the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah <S%H7643><s%>; the lords <S%H1167><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> have broken down <S%H1986><s%> the choice branches <S%H8291><s%> thereof <S%H5060><s%>, which reached even unto Jazer <S%H3270><s%>, which wandered <S%H8582><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>; its shoots <S%H7976><s%> were spread abroad <S%H5203><s%>, they passed over <S%H5674><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%>.

Therefore I will weep <S%H1058><s%> with the weeping <S%H1065><s%> of Jazer <S%H3270><s%> for the vine <S%H1612><s%> of Sibmah <S%H7643><s%>; I will water <S%H7301><s%> thee with my tears <S%H1832><s%>, O Heshbon <S%H2809><s%>, and Elealeh <S%H500><s%>: for upon thy summer fruits <S%H7019><s%> and upon thy harvest <S%H7105><s%> the battle shout <S%H1959><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%>.

And gladness <S%H8057><s%> is taken away <S%H622><s%>, and joy <S%H1524><s%> out of the fruitful field <S%H3759><s%>; and in the vineyards <S%H3754><s%> there shall be no singing <S%H7442><s%>, neither joyful noise <S%H7321><s%>: no treader <S%H1869><s%> shall tread out <S%H1869><s%> wine <S%H3196><s%> in the presses <S%H3342><s%>; I have made the vintage shout <S%H1959><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%>.
Wherefore my heart <S%H4578><s%> soundeth <S%H1993><s%> like a harp <S%H3658><s%> for Moab <S%H4124><s%>, and mine inward parts <S%H7130><s%> for Kir-heres <S%H7025><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H4124><s%>, when Moab presenteth <S%H7200><s%> himself <S%H3811><s%>, when he wearieth himself upon the high place <S%H1116><s%>, and shall come <S%H935><s%> to his sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> to pray <S%H6419><s%>, that he shall not prevail <S%H3201><s%>.
This is the word <S%H1697><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> concerning Moab <S%H4124><s%> in time past <S%H227><s%>.

But now Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath spoken <S%H1696><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Within three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>, as the years <S%H8141><s%> of a hireling <S%H7916><s%>, the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> shall be brought into contempt <S%H7034><s%>, with all his great <S%H7227><s%> multitude <S%H1995><s%>; and the remnant <S%H7605><s%> shall be very <S%H4592><s%> small <S%H4213><s%> and of no account <S%H3808><s%>.
